snippet: Regulators say the financial system is stronger than a year ago, but remains vulnerable to fiscal uncertainty, the housing sector’s weakness and other sources of stress.
abstract: Financial Stability Oversight Council says the nation's financial system is stronger than a year ago, but remains vulnerable to fiscal uncertainty, the housing sector’s weakness and other sources of stress.
lead_paragraph: Regulators say the financial system is stronger than a year ago, but remains vulnerable to fiscal uncertainty, the housing sector’s weakness and other sources of stress.

headline.seo: Report Cites Threats to Market Stability
headline.main: Despite Stronger Financial System, Report Cites Threats to U.S. Market Stability
headline.print_headline: Despite Stronger Financial System, Report Cites Threats to U.S. Market Stability

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
